channel.title: Jython
channel.description:
Only question is how would I implement the use of my scripts? The ScriptManager is loading all the files just fine, but I wrote this little test script here: [code=python] from server.util import ScriptManager
def test(player): player.sendMessage("Test")[/code]
As an example lets just use a command, [code=Java] case "test": /* What to add here? */ [/code] Any help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Jython
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Only question is how would I implement the use of my scripts? The ScriptManager is loading all the files just fine, but I wrote this little test script here:

[code=python]
from server.util import ScriptManager

def test(player):
player.sendMessage(“Test”)[/code]

As an example lets just use a command,

case "test":
/* What to add here? */

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
